snippet: Mayor Edwin M. Lee of San Francisco unveiled a $94 million initiative to expand affordable housing over the next two years in the latest bid to address surging home prices, rental rates and evictions.
abstract: San Francisco Mayor Edwin M Lee unveils a $94 million initiative to expand affordable housing over the next two years in latest bid to address surging home prices, rental rates and evictions.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Edwin M. Lee of San Francisco unveiled a $94 million initiative to expand affordable housing over the next two years in the latest bid to address surging home prices, rental rates and evictions.
